m_szDocTitle: Apple Car, Oculus Rift, BuzzFeed are the talk of Code Conference - LA Times
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Apple Car, Oculus Rift, BuzzFeed are the talk of Code Conference Kara Swisher and Hillary Clinton Marcio Jose Sanchez / Associated Press Kara Swisher, left, high-fives Hillary Rodham Clinton during the Watermark Silicon Valley Conference for Women in February. On Tuesday, Vox Media announced that it had acquired Re/Code, the tech business news site cofounded by Swisher and Walt Mossberg.
